amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 116-6 to prevent interpretation by the VA that only one of the two parents could be considered the primary caretaker.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Rodney amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Davis, Rodney.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davis, Rodney amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Davis, Rodney.
